title: O'Dell's Gluten Free Bakery & Cafe
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Western, Delivery, Take-out, Bakery, Catering, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Makes a large majority of its products vegan-suitable, including cookies, muffins, English muffins, squares, breads, and buns. Cafe has a sandwich that can be made vegan, and pizzas can be made vegan as well. Does not use egg or dairy in the bakery, only in cafe.
